name: Model Showcase
description:
Description

This model showcase was created for my 1st coursework for my design process module at university. The main focus of this was the modelling and design process of making those models and textures. The showcase also shows off the lighting, ambience and sound play in these scenarios as well.

The model showcase contains two scenarios, one involving a door while another involves a bedroom. 

Controls

WSAD - Move

Mouse - Look Around

E - Interact
